resource-utils.config.title: Resource Utils Config
resource-utils.config.category.general.t: General options that change how the mod itself works.
resource-utils.config.option.low_fire.de: Modify the amount that the fire effect will be lowered by.
resource-utils.config.option.low_held_up: Modify the amount that a held up shield will be lowered by.
resource-utils.config.option.low_side_sh: Modify the amount that a shield will be lowered by whilst not being actively used.
resource-utils.config.option.side_shield: Display the shield on the side.
resource-utils.config.option.shield_size: Modify the size of a shield from 100%. WARNING: This might clash with Low Shield and make the shield not visible.
resource-utils.config.option.small_totem: Modify the amount that the totem effect should be reduced by.
resource-utils.config.option.small_fire_: Display smaller flames on ground and when the player is on fire in third person.
